item.title: Problem solved
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:1, topic:417858”]All i got is this under getAttackEmote void, if(weaponName.contains("2h sword") || weaponName.contains("godsword") || weaponName.contains("saradomin sword") || weaponName.contains("War Axe") || weaponName.contains("Heaven's Fu") || weaponName.contains("Fallen Ang")){ switch(c.fightMode) { case 0: return 7041; case 2: return 7041; case 1: return 7048; } } It attacks like a normal 1h weapon though, I looked in ItemAssistant.java and nothing is there to help this.[/quote]You give everyone BS answers, but you expect people to help you? I lol’d.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem solved
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

All i got is this under getAttackEmote void, if(weaponName.contains("2h sword") || weaponName.contains("godsword") || weaponName.contains("saradomin sword") || weaponName.contains("War Axe") || weaponName.contains("Heaven's Fu") || weaponName.contains("Fallen Ang")){ switch(c.fightMode) { case 0: return 7041; case 2: return 7041; case 1: return 7048; } } It attacks like a normal 1h weapon though, I looked in ItemAssistant.java and nothing is there to help this.

Read full topic
